list 177.5 486 940 300 553 553 MultiplexInfoAutoUp MultiplexInfoTriggerUp 60 60 horizontal 2 250 Animation_HideMultiplex --> Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502)
MultiplexIconDimensionsMusicWrap defaultaudio.png MultiplexMusicThumbKeep MultiplexMusicThumbStretch ListItem.Icon Skin.HasSetting(flattenmultiplex) + !Control.IsVisible(5100)
MultiplexIconDimensionsMusicWrap thumbs/cd_shadow_light.png thumbs/cd_glass.png scale Skin.HasSetting(flattenmultiplex) + !Control.IsVisible(5100)
MultiplexIconDimensionsMusicWrap common/blank.png 58FFFFFF
